title: Faculty Contract Renewal
description: A department chair needs to initiate the contract renewal process for a non-tenured faculty member.

tasks.description: Identify the faculty member whose contract is up for renewal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the faculty member's record and confirms their contract end date.

tasks.description: Generate the standard contract renewal packet in the HR system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates the required forms and documents.

tasks.description: Route the packet to the department chair for review and recommendation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent initiates the approval workflow in the HR system.
